channel.title: Number Theoretic Database for Twists and others
channel.description: Recent content on Number Theoretic Database for Twists and others

item.title: Database for Twists
item.description: XMin is the first Hugo theme I have designed. The original reason that I wrote it was I needed a minimal example of Hugo themes when I was writing the blogdown book. Basically I wanted a simple theme that supports a navigation menu, a home page, other single pages, lists of pages, blog posts, categories, tags, and RSS. That is all. Nothing fancy. In terms of CSS and JavaScript, I really want to keep them minimal.

item.title: Publications
item.description: Hershy Kisilevsky with Appendix by Jungbae Nam. Small Algebraic Central Values of Twists of Elliptic $L$-Functions, 2021 (Preprint) Chantal David and Lucile Devin and Jungbae Nam and Jeremy Schlitt. Lemke Oliver and Soundararajan bias for consecutive sums of two squares, Math.Ann., Nov. 2021 (DOI) (Preprint) (PARI/GP Codes) (Mathematica Codes for Th. 2.1, Prop. 7.1 and 7.2 by Jeremy Schlitt) Chantal David and Matilde Lal√≠n and Jungbae Nam.
